plot: An accounting firm turns to a local staffing firm when one of their accountants calls in sick. Unfortunately, the staffing firm only sends out zombie temps. Once the zombie temp arrives, all hell breaks loose.
title: Zombie, Inc.
plot_es: An accounting firm turns to a local staffing firm when one of their accountants calls in sick. Unfortunately, the staffing firm only sends out zombie temps. Once the zombie temp arrives, all hell breaks loose.
plot_en: An accounting firm turns to a local staffing firm when one of their accountants calls in sick. Unfortunately, the staffing firm only sends out zombie temps. Once the zombie temp arrives, all hell breaks loose.
